title: Private hire/taxi driver verification cards (female safety)
dataVerified: Driver name, photo, license number, vehicle details, licensing authority
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Female safety - verify driver credentials before entering vehicle late at night. Domain binding verifies licensing authority (e.g., private-hire.tfl.gov.uk). Real-time verification shows driver photo. Prevents fake driver credentials. Deters impersonation fraud. Critical safety feature for vulnerable passengers.
